content.html: Financial services company that requires MFA (multi-factor authentication) via SMS messages to login to their website just let me change my MFA phone number without any verification that I have access to either the old or new phone number. #HeadDesk #StupidSecurityTricks
content.value:
Financial services company that requires MFA (multi-factor authentication) via SMS messages to login to their website just let me change my MFA phone number without any verification that I have access to either the old or new phone number.

#HeadDesk

#StupidSecurityTricks
